channel.title: Teachers Suck
channel.description:
http://news.yahoo.com/s/nm/crime_feces1_dc;_ylt=AqZY2t.lf9pI.Izd.ORqW4ztiBIF
TORONTO (Reuters) - A Toronto school principal who pleaded guilty to throwing human excrement at a 12-year-old boy may get her job back, officials said on Tuesday
Typical Canadians. "Well, we know you threw a bunch of shit at one of the kids, but since you admitted it right away, let's just forget about it. You have obviously suffered enough."

item.title: Teachers Suck
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

hey… I’m from toronto XD

but still not all of us are noobs like that person. My teacher two years ago got a 22 day suspension (yea teacher suspension) for throwing a grade 1 kid at one of his students.

Read full topic

item.title: Teachers Suck
item.dc:creator: @server_dude server dude
item.description:
@server_dude wrote:

yeh that sounds reasonable. they gave her another go, she might get a better shot next time

Read full topic
